PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI and cardiogenic shock.
Underwent percutaneous coronary intervention and Impella insertion followed by removal.
Patient remains on mechanical ventilation and medications for heart failure and rhythm control.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 after a lengthy intensive care course.

InfectionIndicators.BloodCulture: No organism isolated, negative MRSA PCR.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Febrile, leukocytosis concerning for infection without a known source; under evaluation.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Received multiple units of packed red blood cells due to anemia during hospitalization.
